data.name: Warplanes: Battles over Pacific
data.description:
Warplanes: Battles over Pacific opens the next chapter in aviation history. Become a World War II pilot and take part in the campaign against the Empire of Japan. The sequel to the hit Warplanes: WW1 Fighters, takes dogfight to a new level.

Realistic graphics and intuitive controls enhance the gameplay experience. The new flight model will make you feel the power, speed and handling of the most popular American and Japanese aircraft. The technological leap between World War I and World War II made aviation the leading branch of the military and changed war forever...

WW2 EXPERIENCE IN VR
● Lead the US to victory over Japan in the single player campaign.
● Play classic PvP multiplayer modes to face off against players from around the world.
● Have fun with friends by your side playing co-op missions.
● Take controls of 15 of the most iconic aircraft fighting over the Pacific.
● Adjust the game to your preferences thanks to 3 difficulty levels.

changelog.change_log:
Version 1.4:
 - Terrain graphics improvements – new textures, shaders and other tweaks.
 - Tracer bullets frequency setting.
 - Bug fixes.

Version 1.4:
 - Terrain graphics improvements – new textures, shaders and other tweaks.
 - Tracer bullets frequency setting.
 - Bug fixes.

–  Character limit in user’s multiplayer nickname increased to 20.
–  Minor bug fixes.

- 3 new planes.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

• Fixed issue with black terrain caused by a new Quest 2 firmware update.
• The host can select which planes are allowed in the session. This gives you the possibility to exclude some planes or even to create a session with only one playable plane.
• Added a requested feature of enabling friendly fire in the Team Deathmatch, Co-Op, and Raid modes.
• Added favorite bar in the respawn window. You can add up to 3 planes to your favorites and pick a respawn plane swiftly.
• Improved particle effects like explosions, smoke, and water splashes.
• Adjusted speed while landing with open flaps.

New content:
- Two new planes: F8F Bearcat and J2M Raiden.
- Over 60 new plane decals in multiplayer. New plane decals are unlocked with ranks earned in multiplayer.
- Special Tasks in Multiplayer. Optional assignments to spice up the gameplay in competitive modes.

Tweaks and bug fixes:
- A pop-up window now appears when you earn a new rank in multiplayer.
- Player’s rank is now displayed in the multiplayer lobby next to the nickname.
- Voice-over added in Challenge Mode informing that veteran pilot and player close to victory are on the battlefield.
- Removed radio effects for voice-overs related to the player’s character to increase immersion.
- Other minor bug fixes.
- Fixed setting flaps for enabled "Switch Thumbsticks".

– New multiplayer mode: "Challenge"
– 6 training missions in single player
– Bomb crosshair in hard mode
– German, French, Polish and Ukrainian translation.
– Bug fixes and improvements.
